pages.text: Undo will reverse the last task your gadget did, whether that means removing the last set of blocks or built, or swapping the last set of blocks back.$(br2)If exchanging back, make sure you still have the necessary items in your inventory!$(br2)Undo remembers the last 10 actions the gadget made.
Undo can be accessed via HotKey or from the Settings Menu of your gadget.$(br2)The cut and paste gadget does not have undo functionality!
